translations: [临床] 换气过度；[临床] 强力呼吸

sentences.sentence: Several notable researchers are studying the effects of hyperventilation.
sentences.translation: 几位著名的研究人员正在研究呼吸急促的后果。

sentences.sentence: Someone panicking can take as many as 30 breaths a minute. This is “hyperventilation”.
sentences.translation: 恐惧中的人可能会每分钟呼吸30次。这是“换气过度”。

sentences.sentence: The effect of pursed lip inspiration and inspiratory sniffing on mean arterial pressure depended upon accompanying hyperventilation.
sentences.translation: 用嘴唇吸气和用鼻子吸气对于平均动脉压的作用主要依靠呼吸的深度。
